comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: The reason for the mempool congestion are Ordinals and its BRC20 tokens. Ordinals are just like NFTs which are inscribed to satoshis. BRC20 are experimental standard for fungible token protocol that allows the mining and transfer of the fungible tokens on bitcoin network through Ordinal inscription. You can read more about them from this link: https://hextrust.com/resources-collection/bitcoin-ordinals-the-brc-20-standard. Ordinals and BRC20 tokens are using bitcoin network for transactions and congesting the mempool often than it supposed to be.
